metadata.title: CVE-2018-6120 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow that could lead to an attacker-controlled heapout-of-bounds write in PDFium in Google Chrome prior to 66.0.3359.170allowed a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via acrafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
